title: Decisions
text: This final section is the core of the experiment. We appreciate you for filling it out completely and with some thought. You will be asked to make a series of similar decisions. For those who complete all 45 decisions, we will randomly select one of your decisions and pay you based on the decision you made. You will make between $15 and $20 depending on your decision.

title: Tokens Left and Right
text:
Each decision consists of allocating a total of 50 tokens between an early date (box on the left) and a later date (box on the right).
Each line is a separate decision. Looking at the top line, you can see that for each token you allocate to the left box, you would be paid 19 cents on January 31st. For each token you allocate to the right box, you will be paid 20 cents, but not until February 28th.

title: Lines and Values
text:
Each tab has 5 lines. Each line gives you a different value for tokens allocated to the early date (left box). The value of the tokens allocated to the later date (right box) is always 20 cents.
For each decision you get a new set of 50 tokens.
The program does the multiplication for you, showing the totals for each date based on your current choices.

title: Lines and Values
text:
Each tab has 5 lines. Each line gives you a different value for tokens allocated to the early date (left box). The value of the tokens allocated to the later date (right box) is always 20 cents.
For each decision you get a new set of 50 tokens.
The program does the multiplication for you, showing the totals for each date based on your current choices.

title: Tabs and Dates
text:
There are nine tabs, listed above the calendars. Each tab has a different set of early and late payment dates. The tab currently selected is highlighted in blue and shows the early date is January 31st (today) and the later date is February 28th.
The calendars help you visualize when you would receive the money. The early and late dates are circled with the interval in between highlighted. Today's date is lightly circled.

title: Navigation and Submitting
text:
You can navigate back and forth between the tabs. When you are finished, click the button at the bottom to submit all of your decisions.
You must make a choice in all decisions before you can submit. We appreciate your taking this seriously and hope the money is worth a few moments of your attention

title: Payment
text:
After you submit, one of your 45 lines will be chosen at random. You will be paid based on your choices for this line. You will also receive an extra $5 thank you on each of the two dates. This will be an amazon gift card emailed to the address you submitted.
Your total across the two dates will be between $15 and $20.
The gift cards will be sent on the day in question. If the line selected for you includes todayâ€™s date, you will receive a gift card today. We have made all promised payments to earlier participants.

title: Example
text:
If the line selected at random was:
Early Date: January 31st, tokens worth 16 cents
Late Date: February 28th, tokens worth 20 cents
and you put 20 tokens in the early date and 30 tokens in the late date, then you would receive
Early Date: $5 thank you + 20 tokens * 16 cents/token = $8.20 today, January 31st.
Late Date: $5 thank you + 30 tokens * 20 cents/token = $11 on February 28th
